uk.co.caprica.vlcj.mrl

Class SimpleDvdMrl

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.caprica.vlcj.mrl.BaseDvdMrl
      • uk.co.caprica.vlcj.mrl.SimpleDvdMrl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Mrl

    public class SimpleDvdMrl
extends BaseDvdMrl
    Implementation of a media resource locator for DVDs without menus.

    This class provides a fluent API for initialising the MRL, e.g. 

     String mrl = new SimpleDvdMrl().device("/media/dvd")
                                .title(0)
                                .chapter(3)
                                .angle(1)
                                .value();
    This will generate "dvdsimple:///media/dvd/@0:3:1".
